com.intel.icecp.node.security.crypto.mac.hmac

Class HmacScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.icecp.node.security.crypto.mac.hmac.HmacScheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MacScheme<SymmetricKey>, SecurityService<String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HmacSha1Scheme, HmacSha224Scheme, HmacSha256Scheme, HmacSha384Scheme, HmacSha512Scheme

    public abstract class HmacScheme
extends Object
implements MacScheme<SymmetricKey>
    Thin wrapper around Mac Generic Hash-based MAC.
